alert.note: Alert for Coffey; Lyon; Osage (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 12:57AM CDT until August 06 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Osage County in east central Kansas... Northwestern Coffey County in east central Kansas... Lyon County in east central Kansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Olpe, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Emporia, Burlington, Lebo, Americus, Olpe, New Strawn, Hartford, Neosho Rapids, Reading and John Redmond Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 128 and 152. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 117 and 136. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
